div.bibl: Onzetoekomst, February 1, 1922. PUBLIC ENTERTAINMENT RECITATION CONTEST.

body.p: On Thursday, February 9, 1922 the Ruth Bible Class wishes to give a public entertainment in the building of the First Christian Reformed Church on 14th Street at 7:45 P.M. On this occasion there will be a contest of recitations between the young daughters of different societies.
Everybory is kindly invited in the name of the entertainment committee of the RUTH BIBLE CLASS.
